document_data.name: ''Lord Alex's Boundless Beer Stein''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lord Alex's boundless beer stein''''' was the [[enchanted]] never-ending [[ale]] stein that belonged to [[Lord Alex]].
document_data.Powers: ''Lord Alex's boundless beer stein'' was just that. An ale mug that, once emptied, magically refilled itself with thick dark and frothy [[stout]].
document_data.History: [[Wizard]] [[Cathexis]] created this eternally refilling beer stein as a gift for his good friend, [[Lord Alex]], a well-known loudmouthed bar-hopping adventurer. By [[1372 DR]], ''Lord Alex's boundless beer stein'' could be found in one of the piles of "antiques" within the [[Torleth's Treasures]] store of [[Gillian's Hill]]. The metal mug appeared mundane, and its magic remained unidentified, mixed with other junk, sold for a mere one hundred [[gold]] pieces.
